exceptions.tactic: apply Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra with (fun n : nat => ex_intro (fun m : nat => residue n m) n (ex_intro (fun n' : nat => join n n' n /\ n < n') n (conj (conj eq_refl eq_refl) (le_n n)))).
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat The term "conj (conj eq_refl eq_refl) (le_n n)" has type "(?x = ?x /\\ ?x0 = ?x0) /\\ n <= n" while it is expected to have type "join n n n /\\ n < n" (cannot unify "n <= n" and "n < n").

original: apply Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra with (fun n : nat => ex_intro (fun m : nat => residue n m) n (ex_intro (fun n' : nat => join n n' n /\ n < n') n (conj (conj eq_refl eq_refl) (le_n n)))).
